featured.title: Personal Portfolio
featured.subtitle: Design. Code. Showcase.
featured.description: A modern, responsive portfolio built to showcase my projects, skills, and experience. Features smooth animations, a dynamic project carousel, and a clean UI focused on clarity, performance, and developer-friendly structure.

featured.title: League of Beans
featured.subtitle: Fast-paced FPS with champion-style abilities
featured.description: An open-source, fan-inspired first-person shooter that blends fast, competitive gunplay with unique, champion-like abilities inspired by popular MOBA mechanics. Players choose distinct characters, battle in vibrant arenas, and experience chaotic, skill-based FPS combat.

featured.title: Men DAY
featured.subtitle: Multiplayer FPS in Active Development
featured.description: Men DAY is an open-source multiplayer first-person shooter currently in active development, built in Unity using Mirror networking. The project centers on fast, responsive gunplay and modern FPS mechanics, including recoil systems, aim-down-sights (ADS), weapon sway, head bobbing, modular weapon switching, and randomized attachments. Men DAY is designed as an evolving FPS project, with a strong technical foundation and ongoing iteration toward refined combat, expanded gameplay systems, and multiplayer-focused experiences.
